title: NERF VAYNE
body:
Nerf vayne pls, me taking 500 true damage in 2 hits vs a Vayne with literally only {{item:3124}} and {{item:3006}} is bs. Dont give me any of that 'DURR JUST BURST HERR'.

 I CANT FUCKING SEE HER HOW CAN I KILL HER and god forbid she gets a good support that can peel like {{champion:117}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:12}}, then it actually might as well be an auto loss unless you have {{champion:121}} {{champion:107}} and thats only because Khazix and Rengar practically have no counterplay if they are 2/3 kills ahead. 

To be clear I dont mind the fact that Vayne has true damage but right now A) Its too high (B) she can proc it every 2 hits and has no problem rushing rageblade because she basically perma invis (C) Vayne used to be picked because she is a good anti tank but now she literally just blows up anything that stacks silver bolts (which is every fucking unit in the game).

replies.body: Vayne w at MAX RANK does only 14% max hp. Meaning by maxing, if you have 2000 hp, it does 280 true damage. So you're math is off by quite a bit

> [{quoted}](name=bluefire mark 2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-15T08:24:30.741+0000)
>
> Vayne w at MAX RANK does only 14% max hp. Meaning by maxing, if you have 2000 hp, it does 280 true damage. So you're math is off by quite a bit

As Darius I will have around 3500 hp mid/late game (with a steraks/Visage/Cleaver build), with 3.5k she deals 490 true dmg a hit. I rounded it to 500 to simplify. How is my Math off by quite a bit?
Because a Vayne with a max rank w definitely has more than just boots and rageblade as you stated.

> [{quoted}](name=bluefire mark 2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-15T08:43:31.426+0000)
>
> Because a Vayne with a max rank w definitely has more than just boots and rageblade as you stated.

???????

Maybe shes behind on farm? Maybe we did everything we could to shut her down but all she needs to be relevant is a 3.1k gold item (with 1.1k boots) and lvl 9?

> [{quoted}](name=DunkProphet,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-15T09:45:13.251+0000)
>
> ???????
> 
> Maybe shes behind on farm? Maybe we did everything we could to shut her down but all she needs to be relevant is a 3.1k gold item (with 1.1k boots) and lvl 9?

At level 9, W is rank 2. Tumble is maxed first.

Most Vayne mains are actually maxing W right now, because of the cooldown buffs (and last year's shift of tumble's damage from 30-50% to 50-70% AD) making Silver Bolts a better first max.

Source: I'm a moderator in the Vayne mains discord. This is a subject that gets brought up frequently, and as of recent, W max is the preferred build for most people (though Q max is done for people trying out {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} again)

> [{quoted}](name=Pokemonred200,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-15T10:10:17.777+0000)
>
> Most Vayne mains are actually maxing W right now, because of the cooldown buffs (and last year's shift of tumble's damage from 30-50% to 50-70% AD) making Silver Bolts a better first max.
> 
> Source: I'm a moderator in the Vayne mains discord. This is a subject that gets brought up frequently, and as of recent, W max is the preferred build for most people (though Q max is done for people trying out {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} again)

But people are also complaining about the extensive stealth, which won't happen unless Tumble is maxed. How can Vayne max out both Q and W by level 9?
Q cooldown was reduced to 4 seconds rank 1, and is now cut in half during ult. Because of this, it's a 2 second cooldown during ult when she first unlocks it.

> [{quoted}](name=Pokemonred200,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-15T11:52:33.570+0000)
>
> Q cooldown was reduced to 4 seconds rank 1, and is now cut in half during ult. Because of this, it's a 2 second cooldown during ult when she first unlocks it.

So, up to 1 second invisible, then 2 seconds visible is "perma stealth"?

Apparently, yes. People said she had perma stealth when she didn't have this mechanic and her ult CD refund mechanic didn't exist (where it did take until max rank for her Tumble to have a 2 second cooldown). It's funny, because her Q cooldown doesn't even start until she hits something (and she can hold onto the auto for 7 seconds) so if it's dangerous for her to commit to hitting something, it'll be up even less.

> [{quoted}](name=Pokemonred200,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-15T13:32:15.026+0000)
>
> Apparently, yes. People said she had perma stealth when she didn't have this mechanic and her ult CD refund mechanic didn't exist (where it did take until max rank for her Tumble to have a 2 second cooldown). It's funny, because her Q cooldown doesn't even start until she hits something (and she can hold onto the auto for 7 seconds) so if it's dangerous for her to commit to hitting something, it'll be up even less.

In older videos, Tumble CD doesn't start until the auto projectile hits, but more recently it looks like it starts as soon as she fires that auto. I'm not sure when or why that change happened.

Patch 5.14 (when BMB started): https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-514-notes#patch-vayne

It was apparently done so the attack would feel better, as the patch notes said:

"Not much here other than some re-tuning to Tumble's responsiveness. We're not sure how much this actually helps, but ideally you should feel better about rolling around and shooting folks with your crossbow. Enjoy"

It had some consequences like consuming the auto if the target went invulnerable while the auto was mid-flight, but because of how the cooldown works, I've considered that a Pro instead of a Con.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-15T09:53:48.198+0000)
>
> At level 9, W is rank 2. Tumble is maxed first.

Gosu has started maxing W first, you know, the best Vayne player in the world?
No, W is maxed

> [{quoted}](name=Sir Saltarin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-02-15T11:05:49.539+0000)
>
> No, W is maxed

How is she even close to "perma invis" like this thread complains about without Tumble maxed?

Ask them since they are the ones that claim that.

I'm just pointing that most Vayne maxes W.

> [{quoted}](name=Sir Saltarin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=00000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2019-02-15T11:21:16.898+0000)
>
> Ask them since they are the ones that claim that.
> 
> I'm just pointing that most Vayne maxes W.

I guess maxing two spells at once is par for the course for Vayne complaints. Oh well.

> [{quoted}](name=bluefire mark 2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-15T08:24:30.741+0000)
>
> Vayne w at MAX RANK does only 14% max hp. Meaning by maxing, if you have 2000 hp, it does 280 true damage. 

what juggernaut or tank only builds 2000 hp? fighters tend to get between 3000 upwards to 4500 health (darius, garen, nasus and other juggers), which puts silver bolts damage at around 450 to 600.

14% max health in true damage in two auto attacks without being attached to a mechanic that allows her opponents to deny it is ridiculous. there isnt even a discussion about it.

there are only 3 champions in the game with max health true damage in their kits. out of those 3 vayne is the only one that doesnt have it attached to a mechanic that alters her playstile, but just tacked onto her auto attacks for free.
Not two. Three. Rageblade makes it two. and why is her w max hp? Oh yeah, because she is SUPPOSED to counter tanks btw.

> [{quoted}](name=bluefire mark 2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2019-02-15T15:50:09.582+0000)
>
> Not two. Three. Rageblade makes it two. and why is her w max hp? Oh yeah, because she is SUPPOSED to counter tanks btw.

i remind you of that, next time you complain about getting deleted by rengar or other assassins without counterplay. theyre supposed to counter your ass.

if vayne killing fighters and tanks without counterplay is fine, then so is your ass getting deleted by an assassin without anything you can do about it.

fun gameplay for everyone.

I'm fine with that. That's how the game is supposed to be. Counters. If you just buy certain items to counter assassins, have a good peeling support, etc and that'll help. I don't see a problem with vayne or assasins right now.

Vayne its the only ADC with the stealth mechanic, and now, she gets to spam it while being a proficient mid game champion?

You make Lee Sin look like he can actually see with your blindness.
THEY NEED TO NERF THIS CHAMP ASAP
I took 1900 damage in 2.25 seconds from a vayne with I.E. Shiv, Ginsuoos, And botrk. NERF THIS SHIT ALREADY JESUS CHRIST!

Vayne is easily the strongest mid game champ in the game right now + very strong late and thats how an adc is suppposed to be. she destroys naything with just guinsoos and botrk. she is also a lane bully if played top because of runes synergizing better with adc and long range champions far better than melee. wich makes her early game way stronger than its supposed to be. This shoulnt even be debatable she needs hard nerf before game goes to hell

If I'm being honest, and I say this as someone who plays Vayne a lot...

I wish that when she was a troll pick and did need the buffs, they went about it in a different way.

Like giving back the attack speed they took away back in 8.2 (going from 4% to 3.3% IIRC), lowering the mana cost of Condemn, giving her better AD growth, or giving her something to help her jungle effectively (if a goal was to make her playable in multiple roles, anyway).

The buffs they did give her (cutting cooldowns on Tumble and buffing the True Damage on Silver Bolts) felt like they completely pigeonholed her into having {{item:3153}} {{item:3124}} being the single best possible build on her. Before, she took longer to be relevant even with Botrk Rageblade, and she had the option of other builds like {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} if it really wasn't needed for her to evaporate a frontline.

The change she got to her Ult->Q having lower cooldown than non Ult->Q is something I still feel like wasn't needed, and a revert to her AS nerf would have been fine if she really needed the buffs. But it's a mechanic that apparently isn't being removed, so :/

vaynes tumble is on a 3-second cooldown and shes stealthed for 1 second. So shes nowhere near Perma invis. Also, vayne has a ton of counterplay. She's a late game hyper carry so if you beat her early shes pretty useless unless she gets a lead at one point, she also has one of the lowest attack ranges of any ADC in the game, so abuse the fact that Caitlyn, twitch,tristana and I don't know...ANY OTHER FUCKING ADC IN THE GAME, has a longer range then her and can poke her, and if she wants to trade back she'll have to tumble, which is on cooldown while your auto attacks arent.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilRubberDucky,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-02-15T14:01:46.453+0000)
>
> vaynes tumble is on a 3-second cooldown and shes stealthed for 1 second. So shes nowhere near Perma invis. Also, vayne has a ton of counterplay. She's a late game hyper carry so if you beat her early shes pretty useless unless she gets a lead at one point, she also has one of the lowest attack ranges of any ADC in the game, so abuse the fact that Caitlyn, twitch,tristana and I don't know...ANY OTHER FUCKING ADC IN THE GAME, has a longer range then her and can poke her, and if she wants to trade back she'll have to tumble, which is on cooldown while your auto attacks arent.

Vaynes early game is not nearly as bad as it was in the past, her early game is actually alright considering how OP she gets Mid/Late game, honestly her early game should be even more punishing than it is now. Also even if her early game was bad, it's not like it's hard to mitigate that with a good support or just sitting a little more passive since you know she will out scale almost every other ADC (besides for maybe a few) so in her eyes, just leaving lane even or down a tiny bit is still winning.

Also her Stealth is perma stealth basically. Her Q is on a 4 second CD that goes down to 2 second CD at max rank, and they buffed Vayne last season (I believe) which gives her Q a 50% CD reduction while in your ult. So your Q goes down to 1 second CD with a 1 second stealth which as mentioned can proc her true damage every 2 auto attacks with Rageblade.

She is a problem and needs to be nerfed.

> [{quoted}](name=EvilRubberDucky,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-02-15T14:01:46.453+0000)
>
> vaynes tumble is on a 3-second cooldown and shes stealthed for 1 second. So shes nowhere near Perma invis. Also, vayne has a ton of counterplay. She's a late game hyper carry so if you beat her early shes pretty useless unless she gets a lead at one point, she also has one of the lowest attack ranges of any ADC in the game, so abuse the fact that Caitlyn, twitch,tristana and I don't know...ANY OTHER FUCKING ADC IN THE GAME, has a longer range then her and can poke her, and if she wants to trade back she'll have to tumble, which is on cooldown while your auto attacks arent.

https://leagueoflegends.fandom.com/wiki/Vayne

2 Second cooldown. Dunno wtf your on about.

'Lowest attack speed in the game'. Ok, good thing attack speed is an innate stat that cannot be altered through item purchasing.

'Ton of counterplay, beat her early game' ???????, her early game lasts until she buys a 3.1k gold item and a 3.2k gold item, effectively reaching her 'late game' with 6.3k gold, faster than most bruisers (which purchase more expensive {{item:3078}} {{item:3053}} ) which are supposed to excel mid game.
Xayah actually has shorter range than her, among others.

At rank 5 her q has a 2 second cooldown with 0 CDR, is a reposition, and gives her next auto a ton of damage in addition to being a reset. While her ult is activated it has a 1 second cooldown WITH NO CDR and gives her invisibility for a second. With ult and level 9 she can perma invis.

Numbers during ult, with q maxed:
90 ms towards enemies
Can be invisible continually for 8-12 seconds, increased if she has kills.
Her attack speed is never lower than her q cooldown, because it's an auto reset that gives absurd bonus damage.
Because w, every third auto does 4-14% max health true damage in addition to already insane damage from q.
E is literally better Aurelion ult, only it applies a w stack, does high base damage and does double damage and stuns if they hit a wall, so you can't fight her in the jungle when she can e, then q you to death immediately.
R: You're literally playing urf, with free bonus ad, because why not.
So basically: if she has ult and wants to run, if you don't have point and click cc, she's escaped. If you do, it doesn't matter, because you have to be within dying distance to use it.
If she has ult and wants you dead:
You die. She has as many dashes as a Kindred in w WITHOUT ult, plus hers empower her next auto, and her dashes come twice as often with ult. Add that to her Ms and you will never escape. If you have point and click: she's invisible. Good luck. If not: only skillshots you'll ever land are thanks to hitbox lag.
If you aren't Jax or a VERY fed Kha'Zix, gg. If you are one of those and don't have surprise on your side? GG anyway.
Vayne is shorter range fed Kindred with no ult. With ult she's worse than a fed Yi . Lategame unless you stun her she will heal faster than you damage her because lifesteal.
The only thing stopping vayne from being a free win is early game, and given a good support or a matchup that isn't too oppresive this is mitigated.
Dont forget all of this is in addition to her incredibly broken Q damage steroid that can crit to destroy squishes.

I'd like to say that no Vayne in their right mind will ever rush Guinsoos, and even with guinsoos doesn't make her overpowered, she's a skill defining champ, and if you can't exploit the mistake of a high skill floor champ like that, that's not a champ being OP that's just you, not being a very good player

> [{quoted}](name=sophisticated,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-15T08:37:53.409+0000)
>
> I'd like to say that no Vayne in their right mind will ever rush Guinsoos, and even with guinsoos doesn't make her overpowered, she's a skill defining champ, and if you can't exploit the mistake of a high skill floor champ like that, that's not a champ being OP that's just you, not being a very good player

Oh yeah let's just punish a champ who get's invis ever second with a dash mechanic added to it and her ability to self peel...Let use some of that good point and click CC.....Oh shit WAIT Riot has been proactively removing point and click CC for years now. Well we can just reveal her stealth with wa- Oh wait you fucking can't because Riot removed the ability to reveal 90% of stealthed  units XDDDDD wtf mate cmon.

Let's be real for a minute, Vayne has a 52% winrate with close to a 22% pickrate. If she's a "high skill floor" champ as you say, with a pickrate like that she should be hovering right around the 50% mark or alittle lower. Let's not kid ourselves and says she's not op atm.

> [{quoted}](name=sophisticated,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TWg3PJ3v,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-15T08:37:53.409+0000)
>
> I'd like to say that no Vayne in their right mind will ever rush Guinsoos, and even with guinsoos doesn't make her overpowered, she's a skill defining champ, and if you can't exploit the mistake of a high skill floor champ like that, that's not a champ being OP that's just you, not being a very good player

Nooo Ive seen a couple of Diamond Vayne's do it. Not as bad these days, Botrk is still standard but some Vayne players do go Guinsoos first.

Also, do indulge me how does me being bad have anything to do with Vayne being able to go invisible literally every second while being able to almost 4 shot anything? 

Vayne is an ADC, ADC's are supposed to be mid/late game hyper carries (I put 'mid' in their so butthurt ADC mains dont cry), Vayne rushes a 3.1k gold item (rageblade) with a 3.2k gold item (botrk). In comparison juggernauts (my class) are mostly rushing Trinity, 3.7k and Steraks, 3.2k. Juggernauts/bruisers are supposed to be relevant early/mid and fall off yet have much more expensive items while a hyper carry can come online much sooner. Bear in mind even with the build juggernauts rush we remain relatively squishy (no armor or mr purchases yet, so we need even more items) as we dont have the luxury of a dash every second that also gives us invisibility for said second, whereas Vayne doesnt need to rush defensive items because of the invis/dash chase/escape tool. Amazing right?
